statements: SELECT * FROM construction_materials;
SELECT material_name, material_cost FROM construction_materials;
SELECT material_name, material_cost FROM construction_materials WHERE material_cost > 50.00;
SELECT * FROM construction_materials ORDER BY material_name DESC;
SELECT material_name, material_cost FROM construction_materials WHERE material_name LIKE 'C%' ORDER BY material_cost ASC;
SELECT * FROM construction_materials WHERE material_cost > 1000 ORDER BY material_name ASC
SELECT material_name, material_cost FROM construction_materials WHERE material_cost < 5000 ORDER BY material_cost DESC
SELECT material_id, material_name FROM construction_materials WHERE material_name LIKE '%wood%' ORDER BY material_id ASC
SELECT * FROM construction_materials WHERE material_cost BETWEEN 300 AND 5000 ORDER BY material_cost ASC, material_name DESC
SELECT material_id, material_name, material_cost FROM construction_materials ORDER BY material_id DESC
SELECT project_id, material_name, quantity, unit_price FROM project_materials;
SELECT * FROM project_materials WHERE quantity > 50;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM projects ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT project_id, COUNT(*) FROM project_materials GROUP BY project_id;
SELECT material_name, unit_price FROM project_materials WHERE unit_price < 100;
SELECT project_id, project_name, start_date, end_date FROM projects;
SELECT material_name, quantity, unit_price FROM project_materials ORDER BY unit_price DESC;
SELECT project_id, project_name, start_date, end_date FROM projects WHERE project_id = 'a1b2c3';
SELECT material_name, quantity, unit_price FROM project_materials WHERE unit_price > 100 ORDER BY unit_price ASC;
SELECT project_id, project_name, start_date, end_date FROM projects WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM materials;
SELECT material_name, material_cost FROM materials WHERE material_cost > 100;
SELECT project_name, project_location FROM projects ORDER BY project_location DESC;
SELECT material_id, material_name, material_cost FROM materials WHERE material_name LIKE 'Wood%';
SELECT project_name, project_location FROM projects WHERE project_location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM materials WHERE material_cost > 1000 ORDER BY material_name DESC
SELECT project_name, project_location FROM projects WHERE project_location LIKE '%New York%'

SELECT material_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM materials JOIN project_materials ON materials.material_id = project_materials.material_id GROUP BY material_name ORDER BY total_quantity DESC

SELECT project_name, material_name, quantity FROM projects JOIN project_materials ON projects.project_id = project_materials.project_id JOIN materials ON project_materials.material_id = materials.material_id WHERE quantity > 50 ORDER BY project_name, material_name
SELECT AVG(material_cost) AS avg_cost_per_material FROM materials
SELECT * FROM construction_projects;
SELECT project_name, location FROM construction_projects WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT material_name, unit_price FROM materials ORDER BY unit_price DESC;
SELECT project_name, quantity FROM construction_projects JOIN project_materials ON construction_projects.project_id = project_materials.project_id;
SELECT project_id, SUM(total_cost) AS total_usage_cost FROM material_usage GROUP BY project_id;
SELECT project_name, location, start_date, end_date FROM construction_projects WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM construction_projects ORDER BY start_date DESC;

SELECT project_name, material_name, unit_price FROM construction_projects JOIN project_materials ON construction_projects.project_id = project_materials.project_id JOIN materials ON project_materials.material_id = materials.material_id;
SELECT project_name, SUM(total_cost) AS total_cost FROM construction_projects JOIN material_usage ON construction_projects.project_id = material_usage.project_id GROUP BY project_name;

SELECT project_name, location, quantity, total_cost FROM construction_projects JOIN project_materials ON construction_projects.project_id = project_materials.project_id JOIN material_usage ON project_materials.project_id = material_usage.project_id AND project_materials.material_id = material_usage.material_id;
SELECT * FROM material_suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, material_type, material_price FROM material_suppliers WHERE material_type = 'Wood';
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM project_details WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT project_id, material_name, quantity FROM material_inventory WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY material_name ASC;
SELECT project_id, total_cost FROM project_costs WHERE total_cost BETWEEN 5000 AND 10000 ORDER BY total_cost DESC;
SELECT * FROM material_suppliers WHERE material_type = 'Wood' ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM project_details WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';

SELECT material_name, quantity, supplier_name FROM material_inventory INNER JOIN material_suppliers ON material_inventory.supplier_id = material_suppliers.supplier_id WHERE material_type = 'Metal' AND quantity > 100 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT project_name, material_cost, labor_cost, total_cost FROM project_costs WHERE material_cost > 10000 OR labor_cost > 5000 ORDER BY total_cost ASC;
SELECT project_id, SUM(quantity_used) AS total_quantity_used FROM project_materials GROUP BY project_id HAVING total_quantity_used < 1000;
